name: Cams Robotic House Development Build
description:
Welcome to Cam's Robotic House! Here, Cam likes to investigate, create, and have fun! Just do not take his pez dispensers! (not full game story, planning on changing it)

Use WASD to move.

Use the mouse to interact, or use.

You can also touch to interact.

Press escape to pause.

Avoid Cam, he will cause a game over!

also avoid his friends, but most importantly, have fun!

Bugs:

the only bug i could find was the fog not working. If you can find a fix, please help!
